description.value: You receive @Compendium[pf1.feats.CjLNTqNGz4zU4zpp]{Command Undead} or @Compendium[pf1.feats.O7Dn4bXZtMW0UstG]{Turn Undead} as a bonus feat. You can channel energy a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier, but only to use the selected feat. You can take other feats to add to this ability, such as @Compendium[pf1.feats.pgRX4VpFemwv9R0E]{Extra Channel} and @Compendium[pf1.feats.1HfwfBOSWtdxFQ2s]{Improved Channel}, but not feats that alter this ability, such as @Compendium[pf1.feats.f5rgOsdDlseGr4o5]{Elemental Channel} and @Compendium[pf1.feats.ieww7CP6JK5pwtpg]{Alignment Channel}. The DC to save against these feats is equal to 10 + 1/2 your wizard level + your Charisma modifier. At 20th level, undead cannot add their channel resistance to the save against this ability.
